channel.title: misato on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in misato on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Fun last lesson before vacation
item.description: Hide and Akiko from 7pm class each needed to make up some lessons, so stayed for the 8pm class featuring Misato and Tatsuya. I think it worked pretty well; they had not met each other, and they are all pretty much similar personalities so I figured they would get along fine. After self intros, most of the time they talked about Akiko’s challenging business trip to Hydrabad, India. Most of the rest of the time we talked about Hide’s work.

item.title: Gave dream catcher to Misato
item.description: 21:17 Wednesday 08 May 2019 JST I felt really happy to hear Misato with her eyes wide, say “a dreamcatcher!” Seems like it was a good choice.

item.title: Misato gave me and Lin bracelets
item.description: 22:11 Wednesday 27 February 2019 JST So surprised when Misato gave me and Lin matching tiger eye bracelets today! I had commented on Misato’s bracelet last week (and apparently praised it too much!) cause it caught my eye, and I had never seen dark tiger eye before. Super striking! I guess this means I should buy her something kinda special from my trip. I probably should have gotten a picture of our matching bracelets.
